name: Account Summary
prompt:
Given an account named [ACCOUNT_NAME], with the following notes:

[NOTES]

Write a summary of the account.

name: SoW Vetting
prompt:
Given the text of a scope of work:

[SOW_TEXT]

Are there any problems with this scope of work?
Remember that it is for client [CLIENT_NAME], on
the [PROJECT_NAME] project.
